TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IIssuanceSecurityTokenAuthenticator

summary.span: Especifica el contrato que debería ser implementado por un autenticador de tokens de seguridad personalizado que emite los tokens al cliente.

span.span: Specifies the contract that should be implemented by a custom security token authenticator that issues tokens to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los autenticadores de tokens de WCF utilizados para emitir SSLNEGO/SPNEGO `SecurityContextToken`s o basados en SecureConversation `SecurityContextToken`son `IIssuanceSecurityTokenAuthenticator`s.The token authenticators used by WCF for issuing SSLNEGO/SPNEGO `SecurityContextToken`s or SecureConversation-based `SecurityContextToken`s are `IIssuanceSecurityTokenAuthenticator`s.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::IssuedSecurityTokenHandler ^ IssuedSecurityTokenHandler { System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::IssuedSecurityTokenHandler ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::IssuedSecurityTokenHandler ^ value); };

summary.span: Obtiene o establece un controlador para cuando se emite el token.

span.span: Gets or sets a handler for when the token is issued.

value.span: Un delegado que controla el evento cuando se emite un token.

span.span: A delegate that handles the event when a token is issued.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::RenewedSecurityTokenHandler ^ RenewedSecurityTokenHandler { System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::RenewedSecurityTokenHandler ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::RenewedSecurityTokenHandler ^ value); };

summary.span: Obtiene o establece un controlador para cuando se renueva el token.

span.span: Gets or sets a handler for when the token is renewed.

value.span: Un delegado que controla el evento cuando se renueva un token.

span.span: A delegate that handles the event when a token is renewed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se debería llamar a este delegado sólo si el autenticador del token administra la renovación de tokens emitidos.This delegate should be invoked only if the token authenticator handles renewal of issued tokens.
